form.label: Stamus TLS Analysis
form.description: TLS Dashboard for Stamus Security Platform

chart.title: Most common TLS Cipher Suites seen in the network

search.query: event_type=tls | spath tls.ja3s.string output=ja3s_string | eval ja3s_elt=split(ja3s_string,",") | eval cipher_id=mvindex(ja3s_elt, 1) | lookup tls_cipher_mapping.csv id as cipher_id | rename cipher as "TLS Cipher Suite" | top "TLS Cipher Suite"

table.title: Less common TLS Cipher Suites seen in the network

search.query: event_type=tls | spath tls.ja3s.string output=ja3s_string | eval ja3s_elt=split(ja3s_string,",") | eval cipher_id=mvindex(ja3s_elt, 1) | lookup tls_cipher_mapping.csv id as cipher_id | rename cipher as "TLS Cipher Suite" | rare 7 "TLS Cipher Suite"

panel.title: TLS Certificate Authorities used in local network

table.title: Most common TLS issuer in internal services

search.query: | snservicesearch filter="services.values.app_proto=tls net_info.agg!=internet" | spath | search service.app_proto="tls" | stats count, min(service.first_seen) as first_seen, max(service.last_seen) as last_seen by service.tls.issuerdn | table service.tls.issuerdn, first_seen, last_seen, count
